name: Scorpion Insect Simulator
description:
In this inesct simulator and animal simulator you can expire adventures from the perspective of a dangerous scorpion. This 3D survival game and animal simulator will set you into a realistic simulation of the insect world. Establish your own virtual scorpion colony. Search for food resources in order to feed your larvas. Exploring a huge detailed natural habitat filled with other insects that will attack.

Fights against enemy insects like huge Scorpions, Spiders or Praying Mantis, Ticks, Worms, Ants.

3D Scorpion Simulator function overview :

-3d animal simulator and a survival game
- very realistic ant and insect behaviour
-open world game with a huge map - explore a detailed, huge 3d natural insect habitat terrain
-> forest environment, different plants, realistic textures, water
-Insect Simulator - other insects as foodsource like spider, praying mantis worms, fly etc.
-attack and fight against enemy insects
-collect food in the form of fruit or sugar to feed the larvas to get new scorpions
-high-quality animation of the 3D insects, spider and other insects
-first person, easy touch control
-explore underground caves wihch are occuped by large scoprion
